feed.title: Plants and Trees Project
feed.subtitle: Another task for Markup Language and Information Management Systems

entry.title: Plants and trees gallery
entry.summary: Gallery of some of the botanical species that can be found in the Park of San Domingos de Bonaval. Includes a description of the Hydrangea species.

entry.title: The other side of Bonaval
entry.summary: The past of the Park of San Domingos de Bonaval before it became a site of special botanical reference. Municipal Cemetery of the city since 1940, its total abandonment in the 80s and its opening as a park in 1994.
